title: Hot chocolate cake pudding
ingredients: ['250ml hot water', '65g instant hot chocolate powder', '125ml sunflower oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 eggs', '315g caster sugar', '265g plain flour', '2 tablespoons baking powder', 'Pinch salt', 'For the syrup', '315g caster sugar', '375ml water', '1 tablespoon instant hot chocolate powder', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
